attributes.action: Require Dacorum Borough Council: to attach an enforcement notice to "no ball games" signs;
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to protect the human rights of householders plagued by the consequent nuisance from ball games played around homes. And further, directing that ball games should be played on the ample recreational fields already provided.

rejection.details:
We suggest in the first instance you contact Dacorum Borough Council.

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
